SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
Il Fulmine Tellurico infligge danno a una creatura bersaglio pari al numero di Montagne che controlli.
Kochende Erde fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl der Gebirge, die du kontrollierst, zu.
L'Expectoration tellurique inflige à la créature ciblée un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de montagnes que vous contrôlez.
La Sacudida telúrica hace una cantidad de daño igual al número de montañas que controles a la criatura objetivo.
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。大地の飛礫はそれに、あなたがコントロールする山の総数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。
Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
Земляные Всплески наносят целевому существу повреждения, равные количеству Гор под вашим контролем.
Golfada de Terra causa à criatura alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de Montanhas que você controla.
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = (filter:Count()) local target_creature = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end if ( target_creature ~= nil ) then target_creature:DealDamage(total, source) elseif ( target_player ~= nil ) then target_player:DealDamage(total, source) end
